title: How TO - Make a Website with Bootstrap

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - Make a Website with Bootstrap with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Introduction
content_sections.content: How TO - Make a Website with Bootstrap

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to create a responsive website with the Bootstrap CSS Framework.
Create a Website with Bootstrap 3
Demo

Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScript framework for developing responsive, mobile-first websites. Bootstrap is completely free to download and use.
Note:
If you don't know Bootstrap,
we suggest that you read our Bootstrap Tutorial
.
Note:
The newest version of Bootstrap is
Bootstrap 5
.
Tip:
Ever heard about
 Spaces
? 
  Here you can create your Bootstrap website from scratch or use a template.
Get started for free ❯
* no credit card required

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers How TO - Make a Website with Bootstrap concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use How TO - Make a Website with Bootstrap effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of How TO - Make a Website with Bootstrap and how to apply it in your projects.
